item.description: A key component of training deep learning models is the choice of optimisation algorithm. item.title: Reinforcement Learning - a Primer using Connect Four
item.description: One of the mainstay algorithms in machine learning is reinforcement learning (or RL for short). RL is an approach to machine learning that is used to teach an agent how to make decisions. The agent learns to achieve a goal in an uncertain, potentially complex environment. It learns by interacting with the environment and receiving feedback in the form of rewards or penalties. It then uses this feedback to learn the best strategy for achieving its goal.
